product_name: Marmot Rincon Rain Jacket - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The women's Marmot Rincon Rain Jacket offers a durable barrier against rain and wind for long days on the trails, quick trips to the store or that seemingly interminable wait for the bus. PreCip(R) 2-layer waterproof, breathable laminated fabric fends off snow, wind and rain while reducing internal condensation so you stay dry, warm and comfortable. All seams on the Marmot Rincon Rain Jacket for women are taped for complete protection. Attached hood is fully adjustable; rip-and-stick adjustable cuffs provide customizable fit. 2 zippered hand pockets provide easy storage; 1 zippered chest pocket with water-resistant zipper secures small essentials. Elastic drawcord at hem seals in warmth; Angel-Wing Movement(TM) keeps the jacket in place while allowing full range of motion. Closeout.
short_description: The women's Marmot Rincon Rain Jacket offers a durable barrier against rain and wind for long days on the trails, quick trips to the store or that seemingly interminable wait for the bus.
